name: friendly doodles
description:
hello and welcome to friendly doodles!!!

this is a short game about befriending (or not) a stickman.

       WARNING!!! this game contains shaky text, bright colors and a little bit of blood!!!

 i made this with flicksy by mark wonnacott in about 15-35 mins, it's my first game so it's really short but i might make a longer one in the future! currently only available on PCs.
